OpportunityStage.name: OpportunityStage
OpportunityStage.description: Represents the stage of an Opportunity in the sales pipeline, such as New Lead, Negotiating, Pending, Closed, and so on.

ApiName.description: Uniquely identifies a picklist value so it can be retrieved without using an id or master label.

DefaultProbability.description: The default percentage estimate of the confidence in closing a specific opportunity for this opportunity stage value. Label is Probability (%).

Description.description: Description of this opportunity stage value. Limit: 255 characters.

ForecastCategory.description: The default forecast category for this opportunity stage value. The forecast category automatically determines how opportunities are tracked and totaled in a forecast.

ForecastCategoryName.description: Available in API version 12.0 and later. The default forecast category value for this opportunity stage value.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this opportunity stage value is active (true) or not (false). Inactive opportunity stage values are not available in the picklist and are retained for historical purposes only.

IsClosed.description: Indicates whether this opportunity stage value represents a closed opportunity (true) or not (false). Multiple opportunity stage values can represent a closed opportunity. Label is Closed.

IsWon.description: Indicates whether this opportunity stage value represents a won opportunity (true) or not (false). Multiple opportunity stage values can represent a won opportunity. Label is Won.

MasterLabel.description: Master label for this opportunity stage value. This display value is the internal label that does not get translated. Limit: 255 characters.

SortOrder.description: Number used to sort this value in the opportunity stage picklist. These numbers are not guaranteed to be sequential, as some previous opportunity stage values might have been deleted.
